did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Robert Kraushaar papers, [ca. 1970-1990]
did.physdesc: Printed Materials, Publications, Reports, Research Materials
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records relating to planning in Great Britain, including the Greater London Council, Sheffield, other British cities, and Community Development Projects.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records relating to planning in Great Britain, including the Greater London Council, Sheffield, other British cities, and Community Development Projects.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Robert Kraushaar papers, #6754. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Forms part of Progressive Cities and Neighborhood Planning Collections.
